net.adamcin.oakpal.core

Class OakMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.adamcin.oakpal.core.OakMachine

  • public final class OakMachine
extends Object
    Entry point for OakPAL Acceptance Library. See ProgressCheck for the event listener interface.

      • initAndInspect

        public <E extends Throwable> void initAndInspect(OakMachine.InspectBody<E> inspectBody)
                                          throws AbortedScanException,
                                                 javax.jcr.RepositoryException,
                                                 E extends Throwable
        Run arbitrary read-only session logic against a post-InitStage OakPAL session.
        Type Parameters:
        E - an error type thrown by the inspectBody
        Parameters:
        inspectBody - arbitrary logic to run against a Session
        Throws:
        AbortedScanException - for preinstall errors
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException - for repository errors
        E - for any number of other reasons
        E extends Throwable

      • scanPackage

        public List<CheckReport> scanPackage(@NotNull
                                     File... file)
                              throws AbortedScanException
        Perform a scan of the provided package file or files.
        Parameters:
        file - the file or files to scan
        Returns:
        a list of check reports
        Throws:
        AbortedScanException - if the scan was aborted because of an unrecoverable exception
        See Also:
        this is an alias for the plurally-named method

      • scanPackages

        public List<CheckReport> scanPackages(List<File> files)
                               throws AbortedScanException
        Execute a scan by installing each of the provided package files in sequence. The scan proceeds in the following order:
        1. initRepository() creates an fresh Oak repository.
        2. loginAdmin(Repository) opens an admin user JCR session.
        3. InitStage.initSession(Session, ErrorListener) is called for each registered InitStage
        4. processPackageFile(Session, JcrPackageManager, boolean, File) is performed for each of the preInstallUrls
        5. Each registered ProgressCheck receives a ScanListener.startedScan() event.
        6. processPackageFile(Session, JcrPackageManager, boolean, File) is performed for each of the elements of the files array.
        7. Each registered ProgressCheck receives a ScanListener.finishedScan() event.
        8. The admin session is closed.
        9. The repository is shutdown.
        Parameters:
        files - a list of FileVault content package files to be installed in sequence.
        Returns:
        a list of any CheckReports reported during the scan.
        Throws:
        AbortedScanException - for any errors that terminate the scan.
